Definitely a solid shooter that holds up years upon years past the release update thank you to excellent service.
It's very good game, i love this game and i recommend you guys! Just bough ;)

CS:GO is my favourite competitive shooter of all time, the mechanics are refined and the teamwork aspect of this game is unmatched. Do not sleep on the utility, smokes and molotovs can win a round just by themselves. Hackers are a bit of a problem and people leaving two rounds into the game is frustrating. the community market for this game is amazing and the profit you can make from trading alone is super cool. Cannot recommend this game enough.
